name: Leedo Baby
description:
Help Leedo get his hat back from the recycle girl by collecting cans and bottles!

Gamepad ONLY Controls: Move: Left Stick Look: Right Stick Boost: X Button Interact: A Button

Short prototype of about 5 minutes of game play. Packages include Cinemachine, Unity Timeline, and Input System: Made with Unity 2021.3.1f1.

Models, music, textures and animations created by Julio. Music girl designed by artist, Tony Ortega.
